actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Polecat Bench area of the Shoshone extensions unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, Wyo.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Polecat Bench area of the Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program in Wyoming. Places restrictions on use of water from the Shoshone extensions unit in Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Polecat Bench area of the Shoshone extensions unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, Wyo.
